div.p: O78/9888, unit 1028, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate* of Expenditure during the month
Quarter crossed out.
ending 30th September 1878.
